trans-unit.source: Represents a control that contains multiple items and has a header.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含多个项并具有一个标头的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to create a control that contains a heading (or title) and multiple items.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于创建控件包含标题 （或标题） 和多个项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property can be any type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性可以是任何类型。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ships three controls that inherit from HeaderedItemsControl: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> A HeaderedItemsControl has a limited default style.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]附带继承 HeaderedItemsControl 的三个控件:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>HeaderedItemsControl 具有有限的默认样式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: To create a HeaderedItemsControl with a custom appearance, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建自定义外观 HeaderedItemsControl，请创建新的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> property to specify the label of the HeaderedItemsControl.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>属性来指定 HeaderedItemsControl 的标签。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> can be any type of object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>可以是对象的任何类型。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to customize the header.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>以自定义标头。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref> has a header.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref>具有标头。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> property is `null`, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>属性是`null`，此属性返回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has a header; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件具有标头;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HasHeader*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HasHeader*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HasHeader*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item that labels the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该控件进行标记的项。

trans-unit.source: Because the Header property is of type <xref:System.Object>, there are no restrictions on what you can put in the Header.
trans-unit.target: 因为标头属性属于类型<xref:System.Object>，有什么您可以放入标头没有限制。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The Header is displayed by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, which is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 标头显示通过一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>，即在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> displays the Header, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: 详细了解如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>显示标头，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *headerString* The string to use as a heading.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*headerString*要用作标题的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An object that labels the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 标签的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A header can be a string or a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 标头可以是字符串或<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header*>属性，如果它显示为一个字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header*>属性，如果它显示为一个字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header*>

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderStringFormat*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the contents of the control's header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示控件的标头的内容的模板。

trans-unit.source: To customize the heading of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, set this property to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>，设置此属性设置为一种<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate></xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>标题

trans-unit.source: For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法 # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*以下项之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *TemplateResourceKey* The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: *TemplateResourceKey*标识所请求的模板的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 键指一种<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中的现有资源

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 属性元素语法是从技术上讲是可行的但不是建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 绑定引用使用，或也是可行的但不常见。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A data template used to display a control's header.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示控件的标头的数据模板。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that provides custom selection logic for a template used to display the header of each item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置提供自定义选择逻辑以用来显示每个项的标头的模板的对象。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> when you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to apply based on the properties of each data object.
trans-unit.target: 通常，你创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>时有多个<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>为同一类型的对象，并且您想要提供您自己逻辑来选择<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>将基于每个数据对象的属性。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否你有不同类型的对象可以设置<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>的时间为<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>属性</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do that, then there is no need to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你这样做，则无需创建一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> or a data converter.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果你有相同类型的但具有不同的属性的对象，还可以考虑使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>或数据转换器。</xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一个模板选择器，创建一个类继承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>并重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element.
trans-unit.target: 定义类后，你可以将类的实例分配给您的元素的模板选择器属性。

trans-unit.source: If both the HeaderTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are set, the template selector property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个 HeaderTemplateSelector 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>属性被设置，将忽略模板选择器属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* A class derived from that implements a practical override.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation*从派生的类实现实用的重写。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: *ResourceExtension*以下项之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey*标识所请求的选择器实现的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 键指实现实用的派生类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>重写。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式添加的实例你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>类作为资源的资源字典。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that contains information about the header property and the number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个字符串，包含有关标头属性和中的项的数目信息<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: 表示此对象的字符串。
